## Introduction

This is an illustration that goes with Quarto issue [#4377](https://github.com/quarto-dev/quarto-cli/issues/4377).

Image:

![Image](resources/quarto.png)

## Reproduce

In order to reproduce the issue, please run:

```sh
git clone 
```

And then

```sh
quarto render test.qmd
quarto render test.qmd
quarto render test.qmd
```

Either at the 2nd or the 3d attempt, this will fail.
